text: tatha baraabar nahin hote do saagar, ye madhur pyaas bujhaane vaala hai, ruchikar hai isaka peena aur vo (doosara) khaaree kadava hai tatha pratyek mein se tum khaate ho taaza maans tatha nikaalate ho aabhooshan, jise pahanate ho aur tum dekhate ho naav ko usamen paanee phaadatee huee, taaki tum khoj karo allaah ke anugrah kee aur taaki tum krtagy bano
